data.title: Tucson Festival of Books
data.meta_description: TUCSON FESTIVAL OF BOOKS Welcome to our Tucson Festival of Books virtual book exhibit, which includes the same titles displayed at the in-person meeting
data.text:
Welcome to our Tucson Festival of Books virtual book exhibit, which includes the same titles displayed at the in-person meeting AND MORE! Use code 6TFB24 at checkout for 50% off plus free shipping through 4/15/2024.

AUTHOR SIGNINGS, BOOTH 202

SATURDAY, MARCH 9th

SUNDAY, MARCH 10th

JOURNALS

North Dakota Quarterly – North Dakota Quarterly is a literary and public humanities journal with roots extending back to the early days of the University of North Dakota. With an international roster of contributors, each issue is a rich mixture of articles, essays, fictions, and poetry. NDQ stands as one of the region’s most widely admired ambassadors and as a persistent landmark in the global literary landscape.

SHOP ALL OUR TUCSON OF FESTIVAL TITLES

To save 50% enter the code 6TFB24 in the promotion code field of your shopping cart and click “Add Promotion Code.” Offer expires 4/15/2024 and is good for U.S. and Canadian shipments only.

To purchase books outside of North America, please contact Combined Academic Publishers by email at enquiries@combinedacademic.co.uk.

This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.

Strictly Necessary Cookie should be enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences for cookie settings.

Enable or Disable Cookies

If you disable this cookie, we will not be able to save your preferences. This means that every time you visit this website you will need to enable or disable cookies again.
